thread.title: Why a Baseball Star Opted for Job Security Over Waiting for Free Agency

author: Jared Diamond
title: Why a Baseball Star Opted for Job Security Over Waiting for Free Agency
text:
Jupiter, Fla.
Paul DeJong hit .285 with 25 home runs for the St. Louis Cardinals last season, finishing second in the National League Rookie of the Year vote. That kind of performance, particularly as a shortstop, would have put him on track for a monster payday in free agency years from now.
But after surveying the winterâ€™s historically...
